snippet: In Ocean City, Wash., where over time people have clammed for sustenance, trade and fun, a love for clam digging remains, with thousands in the state buying licenses each year.
abstract: Love for clam digging remains in Ocean City, Wash, where the beloved tradition goes back  thousands of years when people clammed for sustenance, trade or fun; many Washingtonians still buy licenses every year to clam but for many, pastime is more a nostalgic echo of a life lived closer to nature.
lead_paragraph: In Ocean City, Wash., where over time people have clammed for sustenance, trade and fun, a love for clam digging remains, with thousands in the state buying licenses each year.

headline.seo: In Washington, Clamming for Food and Tradition
headline.main: In Washington, Clamming for Food and Tradition
headline.print_headline: In Washington, Clamming For Food and Tradition
